summary: Adds new clothes with a dwarven theme, with both an enchanted and unenchanted version. The clothes can be found in any dwarven chests and in a few spacific locations. Perfect for Dwarven mage or steath charicters. Includes both a male and female version.
descriptionHtml:
Adds new clothes with a dwarven theme, all with both an enchanted and unenchanted version. The clothes can be found in any dwarven chests and in a few specific locations. Perfect for Dwarven mage or stealth characters. Includes both a male and female version. (This mod is entirely standalone)

Garneted locations (Garb):
Dwemer museum
Sinderion\'s Field Laboratory

Enchantments:
Dwemer Gloves- Smithing 10%, Magicka regen 20%

Dwemer Boots- Carryweight: 30, Stamina regen 10%

Dwemer Garb- All spells cost 5% less, Magicka regain 25%

Dwemer Hood- Magicka regain 25%

Dwarven Amulet- Smithing 25%

Extravagant Dwemer Robes- All spells cost 10% less, Magicka regain 50%

Extravagant Dwemer Hood- Magicka regain 30%

Feel free to leave your opinion in the comments section!

Also check out my new Blessings of the Madgod Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38348/?
author: D0VAK11N
